text: Strange People () is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasily Shukshin.Жил такой парень: за что мы любим Василия ШукшинаСТРАННЫЕ ЛЮДИ (КИНОАЛЬМАНАХ) (1969) It stars Vsevolod Sanayev, Panteleymon Krymov, and Sergei Nikonenko. == Actors == * Vsevolod Sanayev as Matvey Ivanovich Ryazantsev * Panteleymon Krymov as Veniamin Zakharovich Dulich, history teacher * Sergei Nikonenko as Vasya * Elena Sanayeva as Ryazantsev's daughter * Nina Sazonova as Ryazantsev's wife * Yevgeny Yevstigneyev as Vasya's brother * Lidiya Fedoseyeva-Shukshina as Lidiya Nikolaevna * Maria Shukshina as Mashenka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Shukshin
title: Strange People (1969 movie)
